name: Retrieving The Past Steam EDITION
description:
In Retrieving the Past...
You play as the handsome, fit, and capable Jensen Wenchester, a former Captain in Team 5 Infiltration Unit, Army Rangers, years ago, but now the successful owner of his own business, Wenchester Security Company. You have several homes, a successful company, and amazing colleagues, and that seemed like enough. But there's something happening and life is about to get complicated, and somehow it all ties back to the events forgotten in the past.
Somehow you are going to need to uncover things so buried you didn't even know you'd forgotten them. Things are going to be exciting as you begin Retrieving The Past.​
.:.
In Retrieving the Past Kinetic novel you will have to choose in Season 3 one out of three possible choices of women you want to spend the rest of your days with. Each girl will have personality traits that you may find alluring, interesting or just her looks may appeal to you more. So choose wisely.
It was very much written with an adult market in mind. No college romps and wild parties but rather a more serious undertone. Still lots of fun to be had.
.:.
Retrieving the Past consist of 3 seasons all combine into one novel/game. RTP (Retrieving the Past) was made to give you the player a cinematic feel and will have lots of action, adventure, love and sex to indulge yourself into. It also gives you a view from many of the characters that have direct input into Jensen our hero which is you the player.
.:.
Indulge yourself with love and really hot looking women. Some may want to exploit you only for their gratification whilst others may want more than just casual sex from you. The novel have villain's to deal with, allies who will assist you in unraveling the global network of organizations that you never knew existed. All the whilst enjoying lots of sexy moments with hot women.
Honestly there is no reason not to enjoy RTP.
